item.title: HTKO Identity
item.description:
Personal Project

Identity design for personal portfolio.

Logo Specifications:

  • Type: Modified from BLANKA - Emmeran Richard (royalty free).
  • Inspiration: Master & Dynamic.
  • Theme: Strong, Typographic, Geometric.
  • Reflect letters H, T, K.
  • Artboard: 600px*600px
  • Canvas: 400px*400px
  • Print media ready.

Card Specification

  • Photo: Toronto, Canada - Illia Cherednychenko
  • Prominent logo display
  • Strong use of grids
  • Artboards: 3.3in*2.16in

item.title: ABC Cakes
item.description:
Freelance Project

ABC Cakes is local bakery startup based in Toronto by Beatrice Chau & her sister Alena Chau. ABC Cakesâ€™ identity focuses on a clean timeless design that speaks of the passion, elegance and ingredients of their baked goods & bakery.
